game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to NPC Arinth
game.description: Rumor has it that the lost artifact is hidden deep in the ruins of Eldoria. Locate it and bring it back to quest giver.
game.reward: 500 gold coins and a rare magical ring

task.description: Search for any clues or signs of the lost artifact within the ruins.
A powerful guardian protects the artifact. You must defeat it to retrieve it.
